article: There's certainly no shortage of wedding planning resources out there, but where should a newly-engaged couple start?To keep you from getting overwhelmed by the extensive selection of Big Day guides, we polled top wedding experts to find out the best wedding planning books on the market.Click through the slideshow below to find out their tried-and-true favorites.
